name: Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Setout & alignment as per drawing (include revision below)
All aircon has been roughed in & tested
All mech has been roughed in & completed
All aircon vents are in correct spot
All air con vents allow for proper detailing around
All mech vents on external allow for proper detailing around
All service risers have been installed
Ensure noggins haven't warped the studs
Ensure position of access panels are marked on the floor & all are allowed for
All services that go through fire rated walls to be treated with collars/fire rated sealant
Duct work to be tear free & sealed prior to cleaning
Final sign off - All mechanical work completed as per the above ITP
HOLDPOINT - Once all above items have been signed off work may proceed
